trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" /> class encapsulates a node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy that is returned during a search through <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" /> 類別會封裝 Active Directory 網域服務階層架構中的節點，它是透過 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher" /> 在搜尋期間所傳回的。

trans-unit.source: Instances of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> class are very similar to instances of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>類別是非常類似的執行個體<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>類別。

trans-unit.source: The crucial difference is that the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class retrieves its information from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy each time a new object is accessed, whereas the data for <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> is already available in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>, where it gets returned from a query that is performed with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> class.
trans-unit.target: 重要的差異在於，<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>類別擷取其資訊從 Active Directory 網域服務階層每次存取新物件時，而資料<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>中已經提供<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>，它會取得位置從執行之查詢傳回<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>類別。

trans-unit.source: Only those properties that are specified through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection in your query will be available from <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.
trans-unit.target: 只有在透過所指定的屬性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>就可以從查詢中的集合<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object with the desired path and uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> method to initiate the search.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立新<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>物件所要的路徑，並使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A>方法以初始化搜尋。

trans-unit.source: After performing the search, the example uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> method to retrieve the live directory entry identified in the search results.
trans-unit.target: 執行搜尋之後, 的範例會使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A>方法，以擷取搜尋結果中識別的即時目錄項目。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> that corresponds to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" /> from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 從 Active Directory 網域服務階層架構中擷取對應至 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> that corresponds to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.
trans-unit.target: 對應到 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> when you want to look at the live entry instead of the entry that was returned through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>, or when you want to invoke a method on the object that was returned.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A>當您想要查看即時的項目，而不是透過傳回的項目<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>，或當您想要叫用方法所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> on each <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> returned through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> can be slow.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A>每<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>透過傳回<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>可能會很慢。

trans-unit.source: The following example is an excerpt of the example in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是在此範例的摘錄<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>。

trans-unit.source: The original example creates a new <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object with the desired path and uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> method to initiate the search.
trans-unit.target: 原始範例建立一個新<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>物件所要的路徑，並使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A>方法以初始化搜尋。

trans-unit.source: After performing the search, the example uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> method to retrieve the live directory entry that is identified in the search results.
trans-unit.target: 執行搜尋之後, 的範例會使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A>方法來擷取即時的目錄項目所識別的搜尋結果中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" /> 的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult" /> 的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.Path%2A> property uniquely identifies this entry in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.Path%2A>屬性可唯一識別在 Active Directory 網域服務階層架構中的這個項目。

trans-unit.source: The entry can always be retrieved using this path.
trans-unit.target: 項目一律可以使用這個路徑來擷取。

trans-unit.source: The following example is an excerpt of the example in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是在此範例的摘錄<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>。

trans-unit.source: The original example creates a new <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object with the desired path and uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> method to initiate the search.
trans-unit.target: 原始範例建立一個新<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>物件所要的路徑，並使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A>方法以初始化搜尋。

trans-unit.source: After performing the search, the example uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> method to retrieve the live directory entry that is identified in the search results.
trans-unit.target: 執行搜尋之後, 的範例會使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A>方法來擷取即時的目錄項目所識別的搜尋結果中。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to parse the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.Path%2A> property from the search result.
trans-unit.target: 此範例顯示如何剖析<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.Path%2A>從搜尋結果的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection" /> collection of properties for this object.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個物件之屬性的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection" /> of properties set on this object.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件上屬性集的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: This collection only contains properties that were explicitly requested through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此集合只包含透過明確要求的屬性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example is an excerpt of the example in <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是在此範例的摘錄<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>。

trans-unit.source: The original example creates a new <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object with the desired path and uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A> method to initiate the search.
trans-unit.target: 原始範例建立一個新<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>物件所要的路徑，並使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne%2A>方法以初始化搜尋。

trans-unit.source: After performing the search, the example uses the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A> method to retrieve the live directory entry that is identified in the search results.
trans-unit.target: 執行搜尋之後, 的範例會使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry%2A>方法來擷取即時的目錄項目所識別的搜尋結果中。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the search result is put into a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，搜尋結果會放入<xref:System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Then, each property is displayed to the console window.
trans-unit.target: 然後，每一個屬性就會顯示在主控台視窗。
